title: MCPC MOD报错！
author: z272191619
txt_content:
能正常开服，也能玩，游戏里试MOD物品无影响.
第一段 
15:00:38 [SEVERE] Found anonymous item of class backpack.item.ItemBackpack with ID 18586 owned by mod Backpack, this item will NOT survive a 1.7 upgrade!
15:00:38 [SEVERE] Found anonymous item of class backpack.item.ItemLeather with ID 18587 owned by mod Backpack, this item will NOT survive a 1.7 upgrade!

15:00:38 [SEVERE] Found anonymous item of class backpack.item.ItemWorkbenchBackpack with ID 18589 owned by mod Backpack, this item will NOT survive a 1.7 upgrade!

replies.author: tsubasa56
replies.txt_content: 第一段是讲你的那些方块不能够升级到1.7.x  也就是地图直接考到1.7的客户端那些东西会报错    第二段不知道   试试删除除了mods和插件还有world文件夹以外的其他文件重新生成

replies.author: 有你更精彩
replies.txt_content: 你的MOD安装的太多了吧可能！{:10_492:}我也不知道

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content:
在服务器里面么？？？？？

如果刷NPC的地方有领地并且设置了monsters f 的话会报错= =我只知道这种情况。。。
